attributes.title: This app is a danger to society
attributes.review: Right when I downloaded the app I noticed that my dog went crazy and started eating his leg off, almost like it put some out some bad omen thing. I also noticed that there was a giraffe watching me through my window and it was giving me very dirty looks and chanting â€œvote trump or dieâ€ over and over again, so I got scared and deleted the app and the giraffe disappeared and my dog stopped eating his leg. I warn you all, please watch out, and keep an eye out for your children.

attributes.title: My phone got a virus
attributes.review: I downloaded this awful app and my phone started glitching and then it completely turned off. I took it to a expert to get my virus removed and it erase all my credit card information it completely wiped my phone clean. All of my pictures of my loved ones are gone, all the pictures of my children since they were born to them now are completely gone. Donâ€™t download this app unless you want to lose everything you love.

attributes.title: Horrible appâœ¨âœ¨â¤ï¸
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it asked for my phone number. Iâ€™m sorry I donâ€™t feel comfortable giving my phone number to a Chetto. And after I closed the app and deleted it, a dinosaur came through my  window and put my dog in the microwave. So at that point I had no option but to give home to my Chinese neighbors. The next thing you know, I made the Dino into Dino nuggets. Let me tell you, those were the best Dino nuggets Iâ€™ve had in my LIFE! But over all this was a horrible app

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review:
Where shall I start?
1. This app sent me 50-60 notifications every single day.
2. As soon as I downloaded it, my phoneâ€™s battery drained so quickly, and it began shutting down randomly. I suspected it was the app, so I deleted it and the problem stopped.
3. I started getting random calls from people from North Korea. I answered one, and the person on the other end told me that they were watching me! I asked them what I was doing, and they responded â€œeating spaghettiâ€ (I WAS EATING SPAGHETTI!!!!!). This app somehow watches you and tracks what youâ€™re doing. This is terrifying!

I AM WARNING YOU! DO! NOT! DOWNLOAD! THIS! APP!
The app somehow gets into your phone and messes with the software, ultimately ruining it! I had to get a new phone number to get the random people to stop calling me!

Do not download this app!

attributes.title: canâ€™t believe my eyes
attributes.review: I was so excited to use this app to support our so beloved president, but as soon as the app loaded, everything in my house started glitching. My lights turned pink, my bed is now on the CEILING. ARE YOU KIDDING ME. My dog stared meowing and now heâ€™s slowly starting to gain super powers. He can FLY now. Thatâ€™s not even the worst part, my phone turned into and AIRPLANE and flew away. Iâ€™m literally typing this review on a toaster right now. I am absolutely APPALLED. I can tell you right now I will NEVER recover from the trauma this app has caused me.

attributes.title: what is this?!
attributes.review: i was thoroughly disappointed in this app. i was trying to be civil and support my president by downloading this app, but all i could see was talk about this dump trump looking dude; lee taeyong was nowhere to be found >:( very angry that MY president wasnâ€™t given the attention he deserved. instead, his spotlight was robbed by some orange looking dude (i personally think taeyong pulled blonde off better...); anyways, i will now return back to my home town, NCITY, because i only trust my TRUE PRESIDENT LEE TAEYONG >:000 do not download 0/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: The Cancer App
attributes.review: This app gave me cancer. Before itâ€™s installation my health was amazing. But following its download I started to feel sick all the time: I was constantly throwing up, my hair was falling out, and I never felt weaker. I went to the doctor to figure out what it was and it turns out I have testicular cancer. My doctor estimates that it formed at the exact time I got this app and thanks to this app I will most likely be dead in a few months. If I make to November I will vote for the president that didnâ€™t give me cancer, Joe Biden
